manifest_description.message: Oculta/muestra los comentarios en muchos sitios web populares.
manifest_description.description: This description appears in the list of installed extensions, as well as when the user is prompted to install it.

toggle_comments_menu.description: The title for a menu item which lets users change the comment blocking state.

automatic_whitelisting.message: Recordar los sitios en los que he activado los comentarios
automatic_whitelisting.description: This setting controls whether, when you click the icon, the extension remembers that you wanted to show comments on that site.

incognito_note.message: Esta opción se ignora en las pestañas de incógnito.
incognito_note.description: The extension won't remember if you enable comments on a site in an incognito window.

private_browsing_note.message: Esta opción se ignora durante la navegación privada.
private_browsing_note.description: The extension won't remember if you enable comments on a site in Firefox's Private Browsing mode.

show_item_in_context_menu.description: Adds the toggle_comments_menu key to the right-click menu on all pages.

change_keyboard_shortcut.description: When clicked, lets users customize the keyboard shortcut used to activate the extension.

keyboard_shortcut.description: If there's a shortcut set, we display this to the right of change_keyboard_shortcut.

keyboard_shortcut_not_configurable.message: También puedes activar los comentarios pulsando $shortcut$.
keyboard_shortcut_not_configurable.description: Firefox users can't change the keyboard shortcut, so this is displayed instead for those users.

keyboard_shortcut_disabled.description: If there's no keyboard shortcut set, we show this to the right of change_keyboard_shortcut.

force_stylesheet_update.message: Forzar actualización de hoja de estilo
force_stylesheet_update.description: This link refreshes shutup.css from rickyromero.com manually.

last_updated_period_moments.description: Shown if the stylesheet was just refreshed.

last_updated_period_minutes.description: Shown if the stylesheet was refreshed more than 1 minute ago.

last_updated_period_hour.description: Shown if the stylesheet was refreshed 1 hour ago.

last_updated_period_hours.description: Shown if the stylesheet was refreshed more than 1 hour ago.

last_updated_period_day.description: Shown if the stylesheet was refreshed yesterday.

last_updated_period_days.description: Shown if the stylesheet was refreshed more than 1 day ago.

last_updated_period_week.message: Última actualización hace más de una semana
last_updated_period_week.description: Shown if the stylesheet was refreshed more than a week ago.

updating.description: Shown when the user forces a stylesheet update.

error_no_internet_connection.message: No se pudo conectar a rickyromero.com. Verifica tu conexión a Internet.
error_no_internet_connection.description: This error is displayed if we can't reach the update server when manually forcing a stylesheet update.

error_unexpected_response.message: Se obtuvo una respuesta inesperada. Inténtalo de nuevo en un rato.
error_unexpected_response.description: This error is displayed if we get an unexpected response when manually forcing a stylesheet update.

name_version_copyright_ricky.description: For example: Shut Up 3.0, followed by the copyright notice

release_notes.description: Links to the (English-only) release notes page detailing updates to the extension.
